details: This course introduces the fundamentals of programming using popular languages like Python and Java.
Learn the basics of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, to build your own websites.
Explore data analysis, visualization, and machine learning with Python in this data science course.
Learn the basics of digital marketing, including SEO, social media, and email marketing strategies.
Examine ethical dilemmas in business and develop strategies for ethical decision-making.
Learn financial planning, budgeting, and investment strategies for personal and professional growth.
Explore the history of art, from ancient civilizations to contemporary artists and movements.
Gain insights into the science of happiness and well-being, and learn strategies for a fulfilling life.
Study the environment, ecology, and sustainability to understand and address global environmental issues.
